title: The W3C Speech Interface Framework Media Types: application/voicexml+xml, application/ssml+xml, application/srgs, application/srgs+xml, application/ccxml+xml, and application/pls+xml
abstract:
This document defines the media types for the languages of the W3C
Speech Interface Framework, as designed by the Voice Browser
Working Group in the following specifications: the Voice Extensible
Markup Language (VoiceXML), the Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML),
the Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS), the Call Control
XML (CCXML), and the Pronunciation Lexicon Specification (PLS).  This memo provides information for the Internet community.
